"},{"text":"Mysterious Midnights","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Every full moon, there is a high chance that a Mysterious Midnight event will occur.

When a Mysterious Midnight event occurs, a howling sound will be heard.

Mysterious Midnight events can be skipped by sleeping the night away."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.mysterious_midnights.1"}]}]
